title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Yang Xueguo
raw_text: Skip to content Issue 77 – February 2013 Cover Art Concrete 9 Yang Xueguo is a 36-year-old Chinese artist from Kunming, a small city in Yunnan, China. His passion for painting started at an early age and eventually led to a career as a university art teacher. His preferred mediums are 3D animation and digital painting. ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
text:
Skip to content
Issue 77 – February 2013
Cover Art
Concrete 9
Yang Xueguo is a 36-year-old Chinese artist from Kunming, a small city in Yunnan, China. His passion for painting started at an early age and eventually led to a career as a university art teacher. His preferred mediums are 3D animation and digital painting.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Concrete 9 by Yang Xueguo
